me lipiya kiyewwata passe mata mathak wuna ape pansale hamuduru kenek kiyapu banak.un wahanse kiwwa batahira ratawala kantha wimukthi satan athiwela thiyenne pidanaya nisa.budun wahanse kantha wimukthiya dunna ekama shastha‡∑≤ waraya kiyala.ee dawaswalama kolambaawishwa widyalaye kathikacharyawaru hathara denek ashta garu dharma wiwechanaya karala thibuna owunge prakashanayaka.ee prakashanaya diwayina puwathpathe wiwechanaya karala thibuna.me kathikacharya waru thama prakashanaya purama budun wahanse hadunwala thibune budda kiyala.mehema kiyala thibuna.prajapathi gothami pawidda illa siti karanayedi nam budda parwathayak se nosali hunne thama sthrinta erehi aasthanaya pradarshanaya karamini kiyala.oya kathikacharyawarungen ekkenekuge nama mata mathaka na.anik thundena thamayi ekek uu mahaththaya kiyana parana je wi pi karaya,anika danatath wishwa widyalaye wruththiya satan meheyawana dewasiri,anika thamayi rajya madhyawala dodawana damma disanayaka kiyana eka.siyaluma wishwa widyalawala samaja widya pita dan karanne batahirin salli aran kantha wimukthi wada karana ekayi.kolambaa wishwawidyalaye hitiya upa kulapathi kenek eya sammukha parikshanayedi balanne wena mokawathma noweyi kantha wimukthikarayekda kiyana ekayi.eeka kalinma danna aya ee widiyata intawiw eka fes karanawa.oya upakulapathiwariyage nayakathwayen thamayi milinda moragoda pawul nithi prathisanskaranata komitiyak path kale.wasanawata milinda paradila eyata adhikarana amathikama nathi wuna.parisara wadasatahan widiyata karanneth batahira kantha wimukthi wadasatahanlu.wena wadasatahan muwawenuth mewa karanawa kiyanne mewa munta kochchara wadagathda kiyana ekayi
